Specs

CSS Class: .x-field-default or .x-form-type-text

Ext.form.field.Spinner

Extends from Ext.form.field.Base

  • formfield (.x-field-default or .x-form-readonly)

    • spinDownEnabled

    • spinUpEnabled

  • trigger button (.x-form-trigger)

    • hideTrigger

    • keyNavEnabled

    • mouseWheelEnabled
